name: Happy Birthday - A Day in the Life
name_original: Happy Birthday - A Day in the Life
description:
Happy Birthday - Day in the Life

Just a quick note: click the mouse button into the game to play. Use arrow keys to move around, interact and change dialog.

This is a game I created about a Day in the Life of my sister from my perspective. It touches on some of the issues she faces and was part of a present (a little belated) for her birthday. She has allowed me to upload for all to see. Step into her shoes and take a walk in this little adventure game created in Bitsy.

My sister lives with multiple chronic illness and this game looks mostly at her diabetes. I wanted to create a game for her, something special and a bit different for a birthday present. It has a few in jokes, some education and I tried to make it a little quirky.

Its not easy living with a chronic illness and even harder with multiple. Diabetes is a very big topic with a lot of misconceptions surrounding it. I touch on some of these misconceptions and prejudices in the game. Some of these are simply old ideas that have continued to be propagated through miscommunication and a lack of information or updated knowledge.

This little adventure will be a bit educational and a bit silly, so enjoy and I hope to be creating some more little games soon.

From Miffical Dragon
